abstract: The chief executive of Citigroup, Vikram S. Pandit, finds himself in the position of having to restructure or make changes at the hedge fund he co-founded and that Citigroup purchased.
snippet: The chief executive of Citigroup, Vikram S. Pandit, finds himself in the position of having to restructure or make changes at the hedge fund he co-founded and that Citigroup purchased.
lead_paragraph: Only a year ago Citigroup paid $800 million for Old Lane, the hedge fund of which Vikram S. Pandit was a co-founder.

headline.main: Investors Flee Chief’s Fund at Citigroup
headline.print_headline: Investors Flee Chief’s Fund At Citigroup
